title: Creating and Nesting Components
description: Welcome to the React documentation! This lab will give you an introduction to creating and nesting components.

meta.title: Creating and Nesting Components in React
meta.description: Learn how to create and nest components in React, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
meta.keywords: nesting, react, user interface, web development, components
